title: SOLD: Ty Cobb Bat Off PSA 4
author: scmavl

posts.post_title: SOLD: Ty Cobb Bat Off PSA 4
posts.post_content:
This is a beautiful card, with great color and perfect centering. The first pic was taken in natural light with no color editing. I have a couple of holes in my collection, so I'm love to trade it for one of the following. Now open to a sale as well, $8000 OBO. Thanks! 

-T206 Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 7
-'36 World Wide Gum DiMaggio PSA 1
-'48 Leaf Paige PSA 1
-'52 Topps Robinson PSA 5
-'52 Topps Mantle (I'd add my 51B Mantle 2.5)
-'55 Topps Clemente PSA 6 (you'd add cash)
-'69 Topps Reggie Jackson PSA 8 (you'd add cash)

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2kuNc6D][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50865345507_15a384ab5d_z.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2kuNc4Q][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50865345402_e8fb2497f0_z.jpg[/img][/url]
A couple of nice trade offers, but card is still available. Thanks!

Would love to make a trade for a nice Clemente RC.

Now open to a straight sale as well.

That’s a beauty. Good luck! 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
